meanings.definition: A person who holds a position in a government or organization, typically a low-ranking or subordinate role.
meanings.sent1: The functionaries in the office help with paperwork and filing.
meanings.sent2: The functionaries attended the meeting to take notes and assist the officials.
meanings.sent3: The functionaries accidentally mixed up all the documents, causing a humorous chaos.
meanings.sent4: The functionaries are the gears that keep the bureaucratic machine running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The functionaries diligently follow orders to ensure tasks are completed on time.

meanings.definition: An official who performs official duties or functions within an organization.
meanings.sent1: The functionaries were responsible for organizing the event logistics.
meanings.sent2: The functionaries greeted the guests and guided them to their seats.
meanings.sent3: The functionaries decided to have a dance-off to determine the best event planner.
meanings.sent4: The functionaries are the backbone of the organization, ensuring everything runs efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The functionaries meticulously carried out their tasks to uphold the organization's reputation.
